name: sphericalcontour
description: Standalone version of the Spherical contours notebook

scripts.build: rollup -c && cp src/index.html public/ && cp src/favicon.ico public/
scripts.data: rm -rf public/data && mkdir -p public/data && node bin/download-data.js
scripts.notebook: rm -f vendor/*notebook.tgz && timestamp=$(date "+%s") && mkdir -p vendor && curl -o vendor/${timestamp}_notebook.tgz $npm_package_custom_notebook && yarn add --optional aaa_notebook@file:vendor/${timestamp}_notebook.tgz
scripts.notebook:comment: echo "In 'notebook' script above, timestamp is a hack to avoid using local cache - see https://github.com/yarnpkg/yarn/issues/2165. No need for that with npm."
